TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendPropertySheet2

Docs.summary:
This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Enables a snap-in component to add property pages to the property sheet of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the IExtendPropertySheet2 interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the "MMC Programmer's Guide" in the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

Docs.summary:
This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Adds pages to a property sheet.

td.p: The CreatePropertyPages method successfully added the property sheet pages.
The CreatePropertyPages method added no property sheet pages.
One or more parameters are not valid.

Docs.param: The on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.
The handle to a bitmap that serves as the watermark for Wizard 97 pages.
The handle to a bitmap that serves as the header for Wizard 97 pages.
The handle to a palette used for the bitmaps specified by lphWatermark and lphHeader.
A GetWatermarks return value: true if the watermark and header bitmaps should be stretched rather than tiled; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary:
This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Retrieves the watermark and header bitmaps for wizard sheets that are implemented as Wizard 97–style wizards.

td.p: true if the watermark and header bitmaps should be stretched rather than tiled; otherwise, false.
